::DrillBit::

"Well everyone is pretty much our enemy. Megatrons and Hell Beasts
Predicons. The Maximals, although we havn't done anything to each other
since when KitKat first got command from Megatron, quite some time ago.
And there is the Alliance. They have attacked us before in that base. An
Alliance bot named Diamond infiltrated the base, and killed KitKat."
It hurt for him to remember his lovers death.
"I guess Diamond could have set a bomb, but without evidense..."
He turned to DarkFate.
"Tell that soldier you got at the base too look for any evidense that
caused the base to explode, or vaporize, or whatever it did."
